Articles.Content:
I found this cool documentary called Man Conquers Space, and I'd thought to show it to you, the KSP community. It's a faux-documentary about what might have been. It kinda breaks my heart to know this didn't happen in real life :/.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wr7GtaU3v5I

http://www.manconquersspace.com/MCSEnter.html

Enjoy!

P.S: Sorry if this has been posted before.

Edited May 6, 2013 by Pluto100
Postscript.

I don't know if it has been posted before, but it should have been. I've been watching that site for almost a decade, wish they could get some funding.

I like this trailer as well. Always brings a tear to my eye.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5780eaztteA

I only found out now that it's been in development for 10 year :/. I hope he gets the funding soon! I would love to see that on the big screens. Who knows, maybe this'll rekindle the public's opinion of space travel.
I would love to see some intrepid KSP modders, (and mission report/Fan-fic writers) make some Colliers/Das Marsprojekt content!
Yes i would love to have spacecafts from Das Marsprojekt!

Yes i would love to have spacecafts from Das Marsprojekt!

Hmm... You just gave me an idea. I'm going to start working on the Von Braun Landing Boat . I'll release it soon.
